data.oai_dc:dc: Data from Hargreaves etal (2015) JEcol Pollination of Rhinanthus minor

All data used in analyses are included in this file. Sheets are: 1) Bombus specimen identifications collected during pan-trapping, 2) compiled data from pollinator observations on Rhinanthus minor, 3) seed counts from experimental plants, 4) counts of pollen grains on R. minor stigmas, 5) demographic data from randomly-selected plants surveyed at the end of flowering. Final sheet includes meta data explaining column headings.
Abundant centre distribution|Autogamous pollination|Distribution boundary|Elevation gradient|Inbreeding|Microsatellite markers|Pollen limitation|Reproductive ecology|Visitation rate
